  • citydesk

Yet Another

135 words written on Tue, Nov 12 2002

...content mngmnt system? you can take the tour.........wow; waaaaaay not SIMPLE! No price yet, but you can be pretty sure it's more than DW, which is 400 clams! (No secret I'm not a big MacroMedia fan...) Come to think of it, this system is really damn flawed, from what I can tell...the content producers see the actual page layout? Why? Why don't they just have a form for each type of content they produce? Hmmm...I'm always asking rhetorical questions about the way I'm going to do SWM aren't I?

...and another. This one runs on Frontier, which is way more than Manila, which seems like a great CMS. Lesson, don't build yer CMS on someone else's big-ass product. Another interesting thing about this one--they use Radio to weblog.
